name: 陳彥霖
objective:
現代通訊與訊號處理系統仰賴電路、硬體與軟體之間的協同運作，因此通訊工程師應具備必要的軟體設計的能力。本課程以建立此項核心能力為目標，並以C++為語言主要教學語言。學生須於課後投入約150~200小時完成一個通訊軟體設計專題。
本課程涵蓋下列主題：
1　　通訊軟體特性
2　　程序式程式設計
3　　物件式程式設計
4　　物件導向式程式設計
5　　泛型式程式設計：使用C++ 標準模板函式庫(STL)
6　　單元測試
7　　通訊軟體函式庫
8　　通訊軟體設計個案研
9　　通訊軟體設計專題
schedule:
Part I: The basics
1. Types, variables, strings, console I/O, computations, errors, vectors functions, source files, classes (2 weeks)
Part II: Input and Output Programming
2. File I/O, I/O streams (1 week)
3. Graphical output (1 week)
4. Graphical User Interface (GUI) Programming) (2 weeks)
Part III: Data structures and algorithms
5. Free store, pointers, and arrays (1 week)
6. Lists, maps, sorting and searching, vectors, templates (1 week)
7. The STL (2 weeks)
Part IV: Software Engineering Issues
8. Software testing and maintenance (1 week)
9. UML modeling for Object-Oriented Programming (2 weeks)
Part V: Mobile and Multimedia Communication Software Design
10. Multimedia Communication Application Design (1 week)
11. Mobile Communication software design, such Android Framework programming (2 weeks)
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments: 50%, 6-8 Assignments
Mid-term Exam or Project: 20%
Final Project: 30%
materials:

2.“The C++ Standard Library : A Tutorial and Reference”(C++ 標準程式庫), Nicolai M. Josuttis(侯捷 譯), Addison Wesley(?眳p出版社), 1999.
3.“C++ GUI Programming with Qt4, 2/e”, Prentice Hall, 2008.
Open source Software Libraries (Source Forge, Open Foundry, Google Code…)
